name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: World of Warcraft Illidari Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Embrace the power of the Illidari with fierce visuals and quick shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Embrace the power and fury of the Illidari from World of Warcraft with this intense live wallpaper extension!

🎨 Minimalist Design: A bold and fiery interface inspired by the Illidari’s relentless pursuit of vengeance and their demonic strength.
⏰ Clock and Date: Stay updated with a display that embodies the fierce determination and energy of the Illidari.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Navigate effortlessly to your favorite websites.
🎮 Play Games: Dive into WoW-inspired mini-games directly from your shortcut panel.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with your preferred engine.
🚀 More Extensions: Amplify your browsing experience with features as powerful and relentless as the Illidari themselves.
